faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Prepcart

questions.question: Is Prepcart available across Canada?
questions.answer: Yes! Prepcart works anywhere in Canada. Our grocery integration supports major retailers like Walmart, Loblaws, Metro, Sobeys, and Costco, with real-time pricing and availability based on your postal code. We also adjust meal recommendations for regional availability and seasonal produce.

questions.question: How are meal plans generated?
questions.answer: Prepcart uses smart meal planning technology to create personalized meal plans based on your dietary preferences, budget, family size, and cooking time. Our system balances nutrition, minimizes ingredient waste through smart ingredient overlap, and accounts for seasonal availability. You can regenerate plans until you find the perfect fit.

questions.question: Can I adjust recipes for allergies or dietary restrictions?
questions.answer: Absolutely. During setup, you can specify allergies, intolerances, and dietary preferences (gluten-free, dairy-free, vegetarian, etc.). Our smart system automatically excludes unsuitable ingredients and suggests alternatives. You can also manually swap any recipe in your plan.

questions.question: Is Instacart required to use Prepcart?
questions.answer: No, Instacart is optional. While we offer seamless integration with Instacart for one-click grocery ordering, you can also use Prepcart to generate shopping lists and shop manually at any store. The app helps you compare prices across retailers regardless of how you choose to shop.

legal.title: Legal Terms
legal.intro: Welcome to PrepCart. By using this website and our services, you agree to these Legal Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use PrepCart.
legal.serviceNatureText: PrepCart is a Canadian web application that helps users create personalized meal plans and organized grocery lists. The service may include recipe suggestions, nutrition summaries, grocery list tools, pantry tracking and optional affiliate shopping links.
legal.ageRequirementText: PrepCart is intended for users aged 18 and older. By using the service, you confirm that you meet this age requirement.
legal.noMedicalAdviceTitle: No Medical, Nutrition or Fitness Advice
legal.noMedicalAdviceText: The content provided on PrepCart is for informational purposes only. It is not medical, nutrition or fitness advice. You should consult a qualified professional before making dietary or lifestyle changes, especially if you have allergies, health concerns or dietary restrictions.
legal.accountText: Some features may require an account. You are responsible for keeping your login information secure and for any activity under your account.
legal.subscriptionText: Certain features may require a paid subscription. Prices and features are shown at checkout. Subscription payments are processed securely through trusted payment providers such as Stripe or PayPal.
legal.affiliateText: PrepCart may include affiliate links, including one-click grocery checkout links through partners such as Instacart. If you click these links or complete a purchase, PrepCart may receive a commission at no additional cost to you.
legal.dataAccuracyText: Recipe information, ingredients and nutrition values are estimates and may not be fully accurate. Grocery product availability and pricing are controlled by the retailer and may change.
legal.acceptableUseText: You agree not to misuse the website, interfere with security, attempt to access other user accounts, reverse-engineer the service, or use the platform for unlawful purposes.
legal.terminationText: We may suspend or terminate access if we believe our service is being misused or our policies are violated.
legal.liabilityText: PrepCart is provided on an 'as-is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by Canadian law, PrepCart is not responsible for any loss, injury, damages, allergic reactions, or issues resulting from recipes, ingredients, grocery purchases, or reliance on the content provided.
legal.contactText: If you have questions about these Legal Terms, please contact us at info@prepcart.ca.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how PrepCart collects, uses and protects your personal information in accordance with Canadian privacy laws, including the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA).
privacy.personalInfoText: We may collect information such as your name, email address, account details, preferences, submitted form inputs, usage data, subscription status, device/browser type and basic analytics.
privacy.foodInfoText: To provide the service, we collect information about your meal and grocery preferences such as cuisine style, time limits, likes, dislikes, restrictions or allergies. This information is used only to generate meal plans and related grocery lists.
privacy.paymentText: Payments are processed securely through third-party providers such as Stripe or PayPal. PrepCart does not store your full payment card details.
privacy.cookiesText: We may use cookies and analytics tools to improve functionality, remember preferences and understand website usage.
privacy.instacartText: If you choose to shop through Instacart or other affiliate partners, certain information may be shared with that partner as required to complete your grocery order. Your purchase and checkout are governed by the partner‚Äôs privacy policy.
privacy.storageTitle: How We Store and Protect Information
privacy.storageText: Personal information is stored securely and access is limited to authorized personnel. We take reasonable measures to safeguard user data.
privacy.locationText: PrepCart is designed for users located in Canada. Some data may be stored or processed outside Canada depending on our service providers.
privacy.minorsText: PrepCart is not intended for users under 18 and we do not knowingly collect personal information from minors.
privacy.rightsText: You may request access, correction or deletion of your personal information, subject to legal limitations. Contact info@prepcart.ca to submit a request.
privacy.updatesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Continued use of PrepCart means you accept the updated version.
privacy.contactText: For privacy questions or requests, email us at info@prepcart.ca.
